title: United States Agency for International Development (USAID) - First Amendments to Assistance Agreements on Strengthening of Social Integration Programme and the Programme for Equitable Economic Growth in Developing Regions
decision_details: - two assistance agreements have already been signed by the Government with USAID for the above and a USAID has agreed to enhance its contribution in a sum of US $1,400,000 and US $3,700,000 respectively, for above two programmes.
